sentences.en: A banquet was given in honor of the distinguished guests.
sentences.cn: 宴会是为了向贵宾们致敬而举行的.

sentences.en: A grand victory banquet was served in the royal dining room.
sentences.cn: 在皇家餐厅举行了祝捷盛宴.

sentences.en: a state banquet (=  one attended by heads of government and other important people  )
a state banquet in honour of the visiting President
sentences.cn: 为来访总统举办的国宴

sentences.en: At the banquet all the foreign guests wore evening dress.
sentences.cn: 宴会上所有的外宾都穿着晚礼服.

sentences.en: Everything you cook for me is a banquet.
sentences.cn: 你为我做的每一道菜都像一桌宴席.

sentences.en: He celebrated his birthday with a banquet.
sentences.cn: 他举行宴会庆祝自己的生日.

sentences.en: He met the foreign friends and gave a banquet in their honour.
sentences.cn: 他会见了外国朋友,并设宴招待了他们.

sentences.en: In banquet halls folding partitions are very popular.
sentences.cn: 在宴会大厅中可折叠的隔板很普遍.

sentences.en: Last night he attended a state banquet at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他出席了在白金汉宫举行的国宴。

sentences.en: The banquet was held in the brightly - lit Great Hall of the People.
sentences.cn: 宴会在灯火辉煌的人民大会堂举行.

sentences.en: The banquet was permeated with an atmosphere of friendship.
The hotel amenities include health clubs, conference facilities, and banquet-ing rooms.
sentences.cn: 饭店的便利设施包括健身俱乐部、会议设施和宴会厅。

sentences.en: The king gave a sumptuous banquet.
sentences.cn: 国王举行一次奢侈的宴会.

sentences.en: The meal that followed was a veritable banquet.
sentences.cn: 随后摆上的饭菜俨然是一桌宴席。

sentences.en: They held a banquet of epic proportions.
sentences.cn: 他们举行了盛大的宴会.

trans.tran_en: a formal dinner for many people on an important occasion
